control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] with no writeable storage that is persistent across component restart or power on/off.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs polling techniques to identify potential faults, errors, or compromises to [Assignment: organization-defined distributed processing and storage components].

Control Statement: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] with no writeable storage that is persistent across component restart or power on/off.
